meanings.definition: Resembling syrup in consistency or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The candy coating was syruplike, dripping slowly down the sides of the cake.
meanings.sent2: The pancake was covered in a syruplike liquid that made it sweet and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The syruplike consistency of the glue made it tricky to stick the pieces together.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was syruplike, soothing and comforting to everyone who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with a syruplike glow, casting warm colors all around.
